title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain as LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web interface for Ollama with chat UI, model management, multi-user support and OpenAI-compat endpoints.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive terminal UI (TUI) for chatting with Ollama models, written in Python.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating Ollama models into Rails or Ruby scripts.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) deployments of Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with async/await, streaming chat, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter repo using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + LangChain for local Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels/DMs with thread support and file Q&A.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI assistance using Ollama: summarize notes, brainstorm, and Q&A inside your vault.

title: ollama-npm (npm search results)
summary: Curated list of 30+ community packages on npm tagged 'ollama' including integrations for NestJS, Fastify, CLI tools, and more.

title: awesome-ollama
summary: Community-curated Awesome list of tools, tutorials, and projects in the Ollama ecosystem.
